name: Bitcoiva
public_notice: Bitcoiva (BCA) has recently migrated from their old ETH contract to a new BSC contract. For more information, plese view this announcement on Twitter.

description.en: Bitcoiva ( BCA ) is the global utility token backed by Bitcoiva Cryptocurrency Exchange. It is basically backbone of the Bitcoiva Eco-system. BCA token based on Ethereum Blockchain with supply of 21million.
